attributes.action: remove islamic extremist Anjem Choudary from the uk back to his home country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is as it says. remove anjem choudary from the uk. this man incites hate towards our home nation and relishes the prospect of a sharia law in the united kingdom. this man has caused upset to millions of uk citizens who sit and say nothing.if the government is to be taken serious then this should happen. at the end of the day if you dont like something, someone or somewhere. you dont have to be a part of it and reap the benefits of it.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
